entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
